about_the_game: Defeat enemy monsters in melee combats , explore the maps for new weapons and items and trade in items shop in this ACTION RPG game. The hero wakes up in a strange land in a state of amnesia. He must get stronger and  find out more about himself and his true purpose and return to his true home .  The demo includes an initial map and some monsters  and one mission at an initial level.

content_descriptors.notes: Mildly revealing characters ,  Not for children

detailed_description: Defeat enemy monsters in melee combats , explore the maps for new weapons and items and trade in items shop in this ACTION RPG game. The hero wakes up in a strange land in a state of amnesia. He must get stronger and  find out more about himself and his true purpose and return to his true home .  The demo includes an initial map and some monsters  and one mission at an initial level.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and above
  • Graphics: NVidia Graphics
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Defeat enemy monsters in melee combats , explore the maps, and trade in items shop in this ACTION RPG game. The hero wakes up in a state of amnesia and must divine the truth about himself and his true calling. The demo includes an initial map and some monsters and one mission at an initial level.
